PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_LandRegistration
PropertySetDef.Definition: Specifies the identity of land within a statutory registration system. NOTE: The property LandTitleID is to be used in preference to deprecated attribute LandTitleNumber in IfcSite.

PropertyDef.Name: LandID
PropertyDef.Definition: Identification number assigned by the statutory registration authority to a land parcel.

PropertyDef.Name: IsPermanentID
PropertyDef.Definition: Indicates whether the identity assigned to the object is permanent (= TRUE) or temporary (=FALSE).

PropertyDef.Name: LandTitleID
PropertyDef.Definition: Identification number assigned by the statutory registration authority to the title to a land parcel.
